citizenship_requirements: Canadian citizen OR permanent resident OR international student
residency_requirements: Must be nominated by Canadian institution with quota
application_process: Institutional nomination required then national competition
required_documents: CV, research proposal, transcripts, 2 reference letters, leadership statement
notes: CAD 150k total over 3 years; prestigious Canadian PhD award; must be nominated by institution

citizenship_requirements: Canadian citizen OR permanent resident OR international scholar
residency_requirements: Must hold postdoc position at eligible Canadian institution
field_of_study: Health research OR natural sciences OR social sciences & humanities
required_documents: CV, research statement, up to 5 publications, 2 reference letters, institutional support letter
selection_criteria: Excellence of researcher (50%) + quality of proposal (40%) + alignment with agency mandate (10%)
notes: CAD 140k total over 2 years; Canada's premier postdoctoral fellowship; health/natural/social sciences

nationality_eligibility: U.S. citizens OR nationals OR permanent residents only
citizenship_requirements: U.S. citizen OR U.S. national OR U.S. permanent resident
application_process: Direct online application via NSF FastLane
required_documents: Personal statement, research statement, transcripts, 3 reference letters
official_website: Renewable annually for 3 years of 5-year window
column58: USD 111k total stipend over 3 years; 2026 budget $127.3M; 55% decrease from 2024 noted; prestigious U.S. STEM fellowship

nationality_eligibility: Canadian citizens OR permanent residents OR developing country nationals
citizenship_requirements: Canadian citizen OR permanent resident OR citizen of developing country
residency_requirements: Must be enrolled at Canadian university
required_documents: Research proposal (up to 15 pages), CV, transcripts, supervisor letter, 2 reference letters, budget
selection_criteria: Research quality + development impact + feasibility + capacity building
mobility_requirements: Must conduct field research in developing country
research_requirements: Yes - thesis research in developing region
notes: Supports field research in developing countries; strong Africa focus; thesis research support

stipend_amount: 2300 CAD per month during academic terms
research_budget_included: Optional summer funding up to 5000 CAD
application_process: Online application via McCall MacBain portal
required_documents: Essay responses, CV, transcripts, 2-3 reference letters, video introduction, leadership examples
notes: Total value ~CAD 100k+ over 2 years; 10 international full scholarships; leadership development; McGill #1 in Canada

institution_name: U.S. National Institutes of Health - Fogarty International Center
citizenship_requirements: U.S. citizen OR U.S. permanent resident
residency_requirements: Must be affiliated with U.S. or partner LMIC institution
application_process: Apply through one of 7 consortia programs
required_documents: CV, research proposal, transcripts, 3 reference letters, mentor agreement, institutional support
selection_criteria: Research quality + global health impact + feasibility + mentorship plan + career development
mobility_requirements: Must conduct research in LMIC (typically 6-12 months)
column62: GLOCAL; strong Africa partnerships; global health focus

institution_name: U.S. Department of State Bureau of Educational & Cultural Affairs
african_countries_eligible: All African countries available as host locations
academic_level: Bachelor's degree holders OR graduate students
stipend_amount: Monthly stipend varies by country (approx. 1500-3000 USD/month)
required_documents: Statement of purpose, personal statement, CV, transcripts, 3 reference letters, project proposal, affiliation letter
selection_criteria: Academic/professional achievement + feasibility of project + ambassador potential + country knowledge
mobility_requirements: Must conduct research/study in host country
notes: Over 400k alumni since 1946; 62 Nobel laureates; available in 140+ countries including all African nations; research/study/teaching

institution_name: National Academies of Sciences Engineering & Medicine
nationality_eligibility: U.S. citizens OR nationals OR DACA students
citizenship_requirements: U.S. citizen OR U.S. national OR DACA recipient
field_of_study: Research-based doctorate in STEM or social sciences
application_process: Online application via National Academies portal
required_documents: Personal statement, previous research, research plan, transcripts, 3 reference letters
selection_criteria: Academic excellence + commitment to diversity + research potential + overcoming barriers
notes: USD 81k total over 3 years; focuses on underrepresented groups in academia; diversity in research

residency_requirements: Must be admitted to Cornell graduate program
number_of_awards: 97% of PhD students receive full funding
application_process: Apply via Cornell Graduate School online system
required_documents: Statement of purpose, CV, transcripts, 3 reference letters, writing sample (if required), GRE (optional for most)
selection_criteria: Academic merit + research fit + potential for impact
extension_possible: Yes - up to 6-7 years with justification
data_source: Official Cornell Graduate School website verified 2026-02-13
notes: 97% PhD funding rate; 2026-27 stipend $60719/year; full tuition + health insurance; Ivy League institution

residency_requirements: Must be admitted to Princeton PhD program
number_of_awards: All admitted PhD students receive full funding
application_process: Apply via Princeton Graduate School online portal
required_documents: Statement of purpose, CV, transcripts, 3 reference letters, writing sample (humanities), GRE (optional most depts)
selection_criteria: Academic excellence + research potential + fit with faculty + intellectual ambition
teaching_requirements: No for first 2 years; may TA years 3+
extension_possible: Possible for 6th year with dept approval
data_source: Official Princeton Graduate School website verified 2026-02-13
notes: All admitted PhD students funded; $46-48k/year stipend; full tuition + health; Ivy League; #1 U.S. News ranking

residency_requirements: Must be admitted to Yale PhD program
number_of_awards: All PhD students receive full funding for 5-6 years
application_process: Apply via Yale Graduate School online application
required_documents: Statement of purpose, CV, transcripts, 3 reference letters, writing sample (humanities/social sciences), GRE (optional)
selection_criteria: Academic excellence + research potential + intellectual curiosity + alignment with faculty
teaching_requirements: No for first 2 years; may TA later
notes: All PhD students funded 5-6 years; $43.5k/year stipend (2025-26); full tuition + health insurance; Ivy League

residency_requirements: Must be admitted to MIT PhD program
number_of_awards: ~150 awards annually to top incoming PhD students
application_process: Apply via MIT Graduate Admissions online portal
required_documents: Statement of purpose, CV, transcripts, 3 reference letters, GRE (some depts), video intro (some depts)
selection_criteria: Exceptional academic record + research potential + leadership + alignment with MIT mission + diversity
teaching_requirements: No for first year; may TA/RA later
renewable: Typically first year; then RA/TA support years 2-5
data_source: Official MIT Graduate Education website verified 2026-02-13
notes: Top 10% of admitted PhD class; first-year premium fellowship; full funding continues 5 years; leading STEM institution

residency_requirements: Must be admitted to Stanford PhD program
number_of_awards: All PhD students receive 5 years funding; SGF for first 3 years
application_process: Apply via Stanford Graduate Admissions online portal
required_documents: Statement of purpose, CV, transcripts, 3 reference letters, writing sample (some), GRE (optional most depts)
selection_criteria: Academic excellence + research vision + potential for innovation + fit with Stanford + broader impact
teaching_requirements: No for first 3 years (SGF); may TA/RA years 4-5
renewable: Renewable annually for 3 years (SGF); then RA/TA years 4-5
data_source: Official Stanford Graduate Admissions website verified 2026-02-13
notes: First 3 years guaranteed fellowship (SGF); years 4-5 RA/TA; $50-52k/year; full tuition + benefits; top-tier research university

residency_requirements: Must be admitted to U of T graduate program
application_process: Apply via U of T School of Graduate Studies portal
required_documents: Application form, CV, transcripts, reference letters (number varies), statement of intent
selection_criteria: Academic merit + research potential + leadership + alignment with program
data_source: Official U of T SGS website verified 2026-02-13
notes: $55M+ in awards; 5600+ scholarships; includes international student awards; Canada's #1 public research university

residency_requirements: Must be admitted to UC Berkeley PhD program
tuition_coverage: Full tuition & fees waiver (CA resident level)

required_documents: Statement of purpose, CV, transcripts, 3 reference letters, writing sample (some depts), GRE (optional)
selection_criteria: Academic excellence + research promise + contribution to diversity + leadership potential

renewable: First year; then GSI/GSR support years 2-5
